channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: New vandalism on zebra crossing, 16th September
item.description:
New in the last 24 hours red crosses have been painted on the crossing between pub and bill hall. Thanks for your action on the other incidents.

item.title: Abandoned building and over flowing skip, 16th September
item.description:
This building has been abandoned for some time, there have been squatters found on the property and now a skip that was placed out front has become a public dumping ground, with everything from food waste to furniture being dumped and rats being seen in and around the skip making it a public health concern. A previous report was made and it has been marked as resolved but it has not been resolved and is getting worse by the day.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blandford Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near the bins, 16th September
item.description:
The man hole near the bins needs to be resolved or rebuilt it has exploded open and seeping into the house hold I smell it in my flat this has been common problem since I moved in last year February and hasn't been sorted it's affecting my health since I did have cancer also I can't live like this at all it needs to be resolved I will be taking further

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Highland Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
